thread.title: LAKE ELSINORE: Library to show family movie
thread.title_full: LAKE ELSINORE: Library to show family movie - Press Enterprise

author: The Press-Enterprise
title: LAKE ELSINORE: Library to show family movie
text:
STAFF REPORT
Published: Oct. 5, 2015 11:03 a.m. LAKE ELSINORE: Library to show family movie Print Photo Share Pin It More Galleries ADVERTISEMENT Scarlett Johansson as Black Widow/Natasha Romanoff in "Avengers: Age Of Ultron." JAY MAIDMENT , COURTESY OF AP/DISNEY/MARVEL Related article » Tuesday, Oct. 6 is Movie Day at the Lake Elsinore Library.
Families and children are invited to watch “The Avengers: Age of Ultron” at 3:30 p.m. The library is at 600 W. Graham Ave., Lake Elsinore.
The 2015 movie, directed and written by Joss Whedon of “Buffy the Vampire” and “Firefly” fame, is based on the Marvel comics and stars Robert Downey, Jr., Scarlett Johansson and Chris Hemsworth.
Information: 951-674-4517
Contact the writer: community@pe.com
